plots = \
[dict(nb_path= 'nbs/geom_col.ipynb', label='two_variable_bar_plot'),

dict(nb_path='nbs/geom_density.ipynb', label='density_curve'),
dict(nb_path='nbs/geom_map.ipynb', label='map'),
dict(nb_path='nbs/geom_segment.ipynb', label='ranges'),
dict(nb_path='nbs/geom_segment.ipynb', label='rank')]

print(gallery(plots))
